website_summaries.verdict: An ultra-comfortable jumpsuit, ideal for lounging or running errands.
pros: Available in a range of vibrant colors
Cotton polyester blend is soft and breathable
Can be dressed up or down

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Wore to a concert in Atlantic City
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wore to a concert in Atlantic City. Extremely comfortable. Runs big. Usually wear 12-14 or Large. Small was just right. If you have large breast, you may need a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy2

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5"3 and 235 lbs and a SMALL was still ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"3 and 235 lbs and a SMALL was still very large in the legs. But overall it's the style of the jumpsuit. So size down or when you just don't know get a small. I have big thighs but small chest. I will take up the straps a little. Hope the pic helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try something new & different! I did!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! 😍😍😍 I'm 235 pounds and this is a size SMALL! I tried something new and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charmin

customer_reviews.title: Awww yea!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jumper/romper! I'm 5"8 about 175lbs and it fits perfect! Comfortable and no Spanx needed ladies!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: A Dress with Legs
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I've hated dresses since the dawn of time and feel outta place in them. My dd wants me to "dress like a girl" for her bday so I bought this. I am 5' 2" and weigh 160. I may have been able to get away with a small but the medium fits good enough. Look like a lady and sit like a man👍
customer_reviews.author: Xyren

customer_reviews.title: It's super roomy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't see anything wrong with this product! It's just as pictured. It's super roomy and comfortable. I might take in the straps a bit because they do kind of drag on me. I think this will be a perfect summer outfit. I'm 5'3" and 125 lbs and got a small. There's still a bunch of room and I wish there was an extra small but I'm sure once I take in the straps it'll be perfect. I'm excited to wear this out! Also sorry for the dog in the picture, he just really wanted to stand in front of me!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love this Jumpsuit! very comfortable. I went with a size M, I have a short torso 5'3" 167lbs. I may have been able to get away with a small. I normally wear Large to XLarge in most clothing, but with this material is easily stretched. I will buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Roman

customer_reviews.title: DON'T HESITATE, JUST BUY!!!! THANK ME LATER!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS JUMPSUIT. I am a curvy 5'8, 214 lbs, usually wear a L and 12/14, and ordered a MEDIUM (since it runs big) and it fits PERFECT. Its loose/comfortable enough to hide any areas you don't want attention drawn to, yet figure flattering enough you don't feel like you're wearing a potato sack. Ladies it is PERFECT for that time of month when we are just a little bit bloated!!!! I bought this to travel in for my vacation later this month, but think this will actually be my vacation uniforms as I am going to order them in different colors!!!! LOL DON'T HESITATE, JUST BUY IT! YOU WILL THANK YOURSELF.
customer_reviews.author: JaiShopsAmazon24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer outfit, throw on and go.. chic and stylish
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite summer outfits. I'm a size 14-16 and the medium fits me perfectly, I'm also very large breasted and I've still ample room in the bosom area. This can be easily dressed up with a belt and chunk jewelry and heels, or dressed down with a denim jacket, no belt and sneakers or flats. So versatile and edgy.
customer_reviews.author: DVSeattle

customer_reviews.title: is it comfortable, like “am I naked with trade winds caressing ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I bought a similar harem romper thingy that was so cute and comfy, and went a little romper crazy and bought two of these in addition to the original style I got. Sooooo, I put this baby on and holy, flying squirrel Batman! It is absolutely ridiculous looking but daaaaaaaaaaaaang, is it comfortable, like “am I naked with trade winds caressing my entire body?” comfortable. So I’m keeping them for lounging around my home...and maybe for sneaking down the driveway to collect more Amazon stuff that is delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Andra Allen

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit! I bought it to wear during my pregnancy and it's extremely comfortable, light and soft! I absolutely love and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: Don't order too small!
customer_reviews.text: First, the material is amazing! After reading all the reviews, I followed everyone else's advice and ordered a medium when I'd normally order a Large or XL. The outfit fits and looks fine, but if you look at the picture it's supposed to be big and drapey. By ordering a size smaller, I don't feel I'm getting the full effect of the outfit. I am ordering another color in a size larger. These will definitely be my summer go-to outfits.
customer_reviews.author: BrnzBarbie

customer_reviews.title: My sister lives this! She's a size 20/22 and ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister lives this! She's a size 20/22 and I ordered her the XL. She says it's comfy and hides her tummy!
customer_reviews.author: netters

customer_reviews.title: Simple but cute
customer_reviews.text: I needed something cute, not to frumpy on my frame, but also not too sexy, for a family all white dinner. This worked great. I had the silver belt and necklace plus my sparkly shoes and it dressed up nicely. I want one in blue and black also. I am 240lbs 5'5 and wear a large top, 18 pants. I ordered xl and I was very comfortable with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: SCross

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to pull up and down
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to pull up and down. I put a belt with mine. Order small. I would normally wear a medium in a jumpsuit, do to the fact that I wear a 32G bra. I wear a size 4 pants. I could have ordered an XSMALL in this. I added chunky jewelry, belt, and Jacket. I can get away with the medium, small would be better! Very well made for the money. Will purchase a in every color for the summer. I can wear my bathing suit to work under it, put a jacket with it for meetings. When done for the afternoon, head right to the water!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: It's baggy and comfy the way it's intended
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7 and 170 I'm size 10 most clothes. Most people are saying the suit runs big but I actually got the large and and is exactly how I want it. Its supposed to be lose and flowy it's not intended to be fitted in the legs. I like it the stretch material makes it very comfy and I like the baggy casual look. I don't intend to make this a dressy jumpsuit (personally it looks cheap to wear this way) stick to this being like a casual look with sandals or over a swim suite cover up.
customer_reviews.author: LetB

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A SURPRISE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a joke and wore it to class. I need to wear a bra and am old school enough that I don't like it to show, so I wore it with a tee shirt underneath. It is surprisingly comfortable, and my students loved it--I suspect at least a few of them may buy their own. I don't wear belts, but it looks good in the photos with models wearing them, strappy heels, and jewelry. For smaller-busted women, I think it would look good with a strapless bandeau bra, even if it showed a little in the back. Excellent value and nicely made. Side seam pockets would take it to 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Women’s jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is like wearing the coziest of pj’s & can be dressed up or down with other clothing items. The reviews helped me purchase well in realizing that they are made big. I am a true medium with a fairly large chest, & ordered a small...fits perfect. It’s a tad awkward in crossing your legs because of the low-made crotch of the pant, but it’s doable. I’m considering buying a couple of other colors because of its versatility in how & where I can wear this! There’s enough room in it to wear insulated underwear & a long sleeve blouse underneath for winter, & then bare-shouldered in the hot seasons. I think it’s super cute & a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Loved this so much
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much. Bought it for my trip to the Bahamas and received a lot of compliments. When I first put it on I was tired and grumpy and almost sent it back because I didn’t like how it looked. But 2 days later I tried on again during the day and dressed it up and LOVED IT! So so glad I didn’t return it. Very very comfy. Soft material and size was perfect. I’m 5’2 and 126 lb. Chevy 36 inches, waist 29-30 inches, hips 40 inches. I bought a small and it fits GREAT! You can dress it up or down. I will be buying another one different color.
customer_reviews.author: Motherof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely 100% satisfied with this purchase I have received nothing but compliments on this outfit ....I am very small 53 145 pounds and I ordered an extra large and I absolutely love the way it fits I wanted it very big and it is so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Reyes

customer_reviews.title: I found my new 2020 spring and summer look!
customer_reviews.text: Let me be the first to say I am beyond satisfied! After reading all the reviews I came to the conclusion that even at 5”8 , 135lbs that I should still order the small and that was accurate! I still get the length at the legs but it fits just right at the top. This thing is so comfy and I only purchased it because my muva in law let me wear hers to sleep and I couldn’t believe how comfortable and breathable it was. I am going to happily buy every color! I don’t care how it really looks on because it’s comfortable but it definitely looks good on too!
customer_reviews.author: Lanexa Denise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curvy girls!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect for those apple bottoms. Compliments the curvy figure.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Ingham

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable jumpsuit ever!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this advertised on another site that ships from China but didn't feel like waiting a month to receive it so I checked here and was so happy to find it. Most reviews state that this runs big so I ordered a medium instead of a large as I normally would have. It fits like a dream and you can dress it up with a little shrug or sweater. I did so and was able to use it for work. Two of my co-workers bought it after they saw me wearing it so it must look nice, as well. I will be ordering this in other colors for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite "idgaf" outfit.
customer_reviews.text: Here's the deal....a few months ago, amid the COVID fog, I decided that I only want to dress like someone who sells handicrafts for a living. So, here we are. I love this freaking sack. Its comfortable...I think it's kind of even flattering, but I am certain that anyone looking at me would probably disagree. Most importantly, I can finally wear something with the comfort of a dress, but that I can also spread my legs proudly while wearing, without having to worry about exposing my naughty bits to the world. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Salomone

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a shot!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this romper after reading the reviews and against my better judgement I ordered a M which is not my size I’m 5’9 218lb usually always buy an XL so I said let’s try the M since it supposed to be so “big” well although it fit it didn’t fit the way I’d like it to. I prefer a very loose fitting romper and so I returned it and ordered an XL and I LOVE IT! I have it in black and army green.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Stunning on my curves
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite summer garment! So flattering for my pear shape, plus fabric is so soft and comfy. Loose and airy fit. I normally wear small up top and large on the bottom, and ordered a medium. It’s still a little loose but not so much that it’s uncomfortable. If I ordered again (and I might!!) I’d go with a small. For those that care, the straps do hang a little long off the shoulders in the back and under the arms, so parts of a bra would be exposed. So pick the size that fits your chest and there will be plenty of room everywhere else. Love this dress!!!
customer_reviews.author: beckydono

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this piece. I'm a 5'1" but plump girl, so I got an XL. I'm so used to things being too small, but this has so much room and stretch where needed. I'll be buying another in L since the leg portion is too big for me. The material is amazing. I'm going to live in mine. This outfit would be great for pregnant women or if you're on a weight loss journey because it'll grow and then downsize with you. The outfit is great no matter your body type.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schnapp

customer_reviews.title: Love mine! Here's some sizing help...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfy! To help with sizing (the reviews can be confusing, I know!) I am 5'7, 135 lbs., 36B and I bought three of them in a small and they are a perfect fit! Long enough to go to my ankles, and roomy without being a circus tent. Quality seems fine, I did not notice any irregularities. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stylish Jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a hysterectomy and shopped for loose stylish clothing until my body heals. This garment fits the bill! The fabric is flowing and figure forgiving and the silhouette is perfect for my current needs. I am 5’4” 135 lbs; I purchased a small in the color Rosy. And, that is exactly how I felt wearing the jumpsuit. Note: the garment’s straps runs long. So to elevate this problem, I tied a colorful scarf through the back straps, giving it a Racer back look. I paired it with dressy thong sandals and jewelry and off I went! I received many compliments! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: LOVELY LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Comfortable Work from Home Garb
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! Just bought another one in another color. It is perfect quarantine wear, but can jazz it up with a belt and jewelry when I get to go into the real world again. It's not the most flattering outfit, but it is the most comfortable and reasonably priced. As a side note, the sizing is crazy. I'm a size 14 and am full-figured, and the medium fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kitty9909

customer_reviews.title: I will be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased! I could have gone a size down with the extra fabric I was able to knot areas of this romper in areas giving it a better fit and at the same time a fashionable added touch. I could have gone a size down and it still be an amazing fit. *I now own two of these, still as happy as I was when leaving my first review. My second order I got a size medium, I actually like the larger fit a little better since I am able to be more creative with tying my knots. (The photo added is of the size medium)
customer_reviews.author: Yannika

customer_reviews.title: It’s Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit! I bought hot pink, but I love it so much I’m ordering black, as well. I wear it to sleep/quarantine and I LOVE IT. I am 5’9”/sz 8 and the small is still pretty roomy. Does not cling, but if you wear it to go out and have any thing you want to smooth, wear a spanx-like piece. With lighter colors be aware there is show-through, so maybe skin color undergarments. You’ll love this slightly avant-garde piece. Also, I have been doing “Stop!! It’s Hammer Time,” dancing! I can’t stop. Teens/husband/neighbors sufficiently horrified. Blahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Mz Z

customer_reviews.title: Just Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 5'7 190- curvy. I ordered a medium bc my tanks are usually a medium and i wanted that part to fit. I love this piece soooo much. I immediately ordered 2 more- one for me and my daughter. It's super comfy and soft. I cannot wait to sport them. I love that the bottom (calf to ankle) fits like a jogger. If you understand the fit of harem pants you will love these. I only wish they had pockets... but that's not enough to make me take of a star. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dl_for_fit

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" 168-lbs and got gut (lol!) --I'm wearing a Large. With 3" heels it's still long. Light jersey material. Nice comfy fit. Haven't worn it out yet. I will most likely order another one. Perfect for dining out... I can still look fabulous, big gut and all! 😆🙂
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, large arm holes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. As a conservative person I wish the armholes were just a taaad smaller. Wore a tank under it. Still would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Yetunde Felix-Ukwu

customer_reviews.title: Lost all color on first wash! Washed it by itself no other garments!
customer_reviews.text: I’m soooooo disappointed , opened up the package to a beautiful blue color garment . Washed BY ITSELF on delicate and went to hang it only to find out that ALL the blue color is gone and it’s a faded ugly purple now! I always have wash new garments before wearing and always by themselves . Very disappointing ....
customer_reviews.author: Zoe H

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's fits I just wish it came in a extra Small, Soft material and very comfortable ! I wish it had pockets
customer_reviews.author: BrittBrat

customer_reviews.title: Not for My Body Type
customer_reviews.text: This is not very flattering on me. I am pretty straight so it just kinda hangs on me awkwardly. I see the potential in the outfit but it just isn't for me. The material is soft and comfortable. I could probably use it as lounge wear but that wasn't my intent when I purchased it. I think this may look better on someone that is curvier than me.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: I really love the jumper but, the material makes it fit kind of large. I ordered the smallest size available and it's still a little larger than what I prefer but, it's nothing a sewing machine can't fix. I definitely recommend it but, I would go a size or two down depending on how you want it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ta'Mika Miller

customer_reviews.title: Size Down - Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a medium or large. I wear a 10-11 in pants and 38 DD in chest. I weigh 150 lbs and am 5feet 7.5inches tall. I am curvy and honestly was worried about getting a small. But it fits, its actually big. The outfit itself is SUPER COMFORTABLE. Arms are a little low cut (personally I like this) but if you are worried about your bra showing, it will. You can dress it up with a belt and some cute shoes, or just lounge in like a giant blanket lol. I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Marie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight romper feels like your wearing your favorite tee shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium. Usually I’m a large. I’m 5’8” and size 8. The romper was huge. I am returning it. Considering ordering a small. Or finding a romper that has less fabric in the harem leg. This is huge!! Love the material and tank straps. Soft and thin material. Like your favorite tee shirt. Would be great for pear shaped or even maternity/post pregnancy. I like it for summer and can layer with a jean jacket for cooler weather too. Cute with scrappy sandals, sneakers or heels/boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: See through with light colors
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit came really quick which was nice. I got the orange jumpsuit in a medium (Which usually fits my bottom and top perfectly) , I am 5'4 and 140Ibs and it was very big on me. You could also see right through it because not only was it really thin but really bright orange. I am returning the orange one and getting the green one in small because I am really into the look of it and it was super comfy! Hopefully the small In a darker color will work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Parker-Roy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for a comfy but cute COVID quarantine outfit. Something I could easily through on for around the house, but also wear out to grocery shop. Maybe I’ll dress it up and go out after all this is over. The material is soft with stretch. Reviews said it ran large, so I downsized. I usually wear a large/XL but got a medium. Does hang a bit low in the arm holes, but not so much that I need a cami under. I’m 5’8” and 190 lbs with 34J chest.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: LOVE - So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jumpers, and have two - teal and black. They are so comfortable, run a little large (but that's what I want for comfy, roomy clothing like this), have not bled onto other clothes, and you can dress them up for work! They are thick enough not to be see-through, nice in spring, summer, and fall (winter might require some long underwear if I would be outside for long periods of time). I would recommend some thigh protectors since the drop-crotch does leave the thighs to rub together.
customer_reviews.author: 3llibean

customer_reviews.title: GET IT IF YOU'RE TALL!!! (6'1!)
customer_reviews.text: Height:6'1 Weight:212lbs Inseam:38" WOW! so comfy and pretty long. It goes right to the base of my ankle and it's super soft! I wish there was a 3X option because I wanted it to be super baggy but thems the breaks! I'm just glad they're long enough. My fiance could not stop laughing. Apparently I look like a "substitute art teacher at a free-range school"! Not gonna lie, I do! Got the plugs in my ears and everything. But it looks dope af! I will be buying a basic tank top that I can cut up and add onto the pants leg. Just so my ankles are covered when I cross my legs. Will definitely be purchasing a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Cute. But Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this and loved how it looked on me the first two times I wore it... then I washed it and it revealed it's true colors. The stitching started coming loose and the material was so thin on various areas that the jumper know looks patchy, as if there are markings or stains on it, but it's just literally cheap fabric. To keep it's longevity,I suppose you have to hand wash it. I recommend it, but don't expect to get much wear out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I decided on going wiTh a small. I’m 5’3 and 209. Wnd for the length in how the legs are I wish they made a XS. I was nervous to go with The small but with my height there is no way any size larger would have worked! I love the hot pink! And it’s very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: hairqueen1

customer_reviews.title: Choose size by the reviews, not by the chart!!!
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart, I should be an XL (43" bust, 34FF/G UK bra, 34H/I US bra). But the small fits great--loose everywhere except the fullest point of my bust, where it stretches ever so slightly. Unfortunately, because I am so petite (5'0"), the drape of the leg lands well below my knee and sticks out at an odd angle, drooping out over the legging-like ankles. It is super comfy, however, so I may play with it to see if I can make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Darago

customer_reviews.title: Crazy comfortable! I'm curvy and it works perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: People have stopped me to ask where I got this! It's really high fashion without the price. Crazy comfortable! I'm curvy and it works perfect for me! I love it with high heals! And really go jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Behr

customer_reviews.title: See through!
customer_reviews.text: The orange one is see through no matter what color panties or bra you have on which I don’t like. If you’re one to still wear thongs that might help but no show panties can’t be worn either. This is better off as a cover up of some sort but definitely not to wear out
customer_reviews.author: TWilson

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, order a SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Typically a size 14 dress/pants & a thick woman. Decided to listen to reviews and went with a small. Surprisingly this worked. Definitely *order the small* unless you are 3x or higher in size. These are extremely roomy and drapey --truly a "one size fits most"
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Feels like being naked.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly but not happy with the way the excess fabric lays against my legs. Its more like a triangular flap. No draping as pictured. Love the camisole area as it makes my girls look amazing. Paired with a belt, the right shoes and jewelry, it looks pretty good on. Just need to figure out a way to get the legs to drape as pictured. Very comfortable and soft material and it is not see through. Will wear it out and see the reactions I get. I am 5' 4" and 119 pounds. The inseam does not go as high as pictured either. Going to put it on a sewing machine and rectify that.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great fit, great color!
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is stellar! Great material, vivid color, very comfy and adorable. My wife loves me in it! I'm 5'4", 44D, and weigh 255lbs, and the XL fit me perfectly. I like it snug on top, which this XL is, so if you want a looser fit, I recommend sizing up one. Warning, though; the legs are just a smidge too loose around my calves and ankles. If you size up, they might end up too baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyeli Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the equivalent of an pajama onesie but for adults. The fabric is soft and comfy and the top fits just enough to make it acceptable to wear in public. I also like how the ankle tapers in so you can adjust the length of the jumpsuit and wear it higher than you ankle or lower. My husband thought it was a bit big but there was no way I was going to return it once I put it on. The lack of pockets seems like an unfortunate oversight...there is enough material at the waist/hips that they could’ve just added it. But despite that, super comfy and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Ravywedding

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this for shorter women such as myself (5'2)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in a medium since I usually wear large in overalls (size10-12) but it was swimming on me. I wouldn't recommend this for shorter women such as myself (5'2) . Material was light, comfy and soft but I usually prefer polyester or rayon for the harem look.
customer_reviews.author: jacklyn villarreal

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this jumpsuit. It's a very unique look and suuuuper comfortable. It was equally comfortable during an eight hour overnight bus ride to Barcelona from Madrid as it was during a full day of exploring the city. As comfy as pajamas but stylish as well. I spruced it up with a belt and denim jacket. Great boho look, and I adore the color. I'm a curvier person (5'4", 165lbs) and the small was more than big enough for me. I was hesitant to buy a jumpsuit from Amazon without trying it on, but this one turned out to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G.

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with most of the other reviews, this is an excellent buy. The fabric is soft, feels nice to the touch and has plenty of room to stretch if needed. I am 5'7", 200lbs and I'm glad I took the reviewers advice and bought a size or two down. The Medium size is perfect, not too tight or too loose for my Pear shape body type. This garment can easily be dressed up or be casual, either way it looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Notha
customer_reviews.text: MC Hammer say what? This was huge, huuuge! So not flattering if you are short like me I'm five line just had a baby I was looking for something to kind of hide the pooch after I had my baby but wow did not want to look like I was MC Hammer. The material wasn't very nice either the color was awful it was supposed to be olive and I don't know what you could call poop smeared brown, olive.
customer_reviews.author: LTM

customer_reviews.title: Skin Heaven 5
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike! Absolutely the most comfortable garment I have ever put on. Forgive my slippers in the above image. I was confused with the size chart but I read all reviews on here as most said the same thing about sizing. So I'll join in to say... I'm 5'4" and weigh 155 lbs. I ordered a medium however, I could have gone with a small. Lots of room in this stretchy piece of heaven. I'm definitely going to order some more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not for my body type
customer_reviews.text: I was encouraged to buy this from a co-worker because I loved the way it looked on her. I loved the soft material, nice rich color, the size large (haven't fit a large in over 20 years)... but it just didn't look right on my body type. Remember the Oompah Loompah's from the movie "Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory"? I kinda felt that's how it looked on me. Everything else about it was good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaciously Bookish

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size down, thin fabric, but sexy!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten compliments on this every time I have worn it. The fabric is pretty thin, so keep that in mind. It is generously sized, and I followed the advice of other reviewers to size down and it was the right move. So comfy, and I don't know how it makes me feel so sexy, but it does, and hubby agrees. Bought black for versatility, but will be buying more colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the material so far and I have gotten quite a few compliments on them. However, that being said, if you are petite and shorter (5') like me, wear these with a heel or wedge. They actually look better on a longer leg. I do really like them tho. They are very comfortable. Don't forget that this is like a jumper, so if you gotta go pee or become a better person, the whole deal is around your ankles and you are sitting naked in a public loo.
customer_reviews.author: Lunar Dreams

customer_reviews.title: A dream for long flights
customer_reviews.text: We were flying from Washington state to Spain and this outfit was pure heaven. It was so cozy and just the perfect amount of thickness. I even wore it around the hotel to get breakfast in the mornings because it was so comfy. The only downfall is that the crotch really is as low as the photo makes it look, so you can feel your legs touching where the material isn't. Just kinda felt a little funny to walk around in because the extra material was flopping around by my knees. Other than that, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooooooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't hesitate to buy this! Its so cute, comfy & perfect for summer. I'm 5'3 203lbs & i wear a sz 12/14 or l/xl depending on the brand. I decided to take a chance (based on the reviews saying it runs big) with a sz small. fits perfect! its roomy on the bottom but fits perfectly on top so i don't look like i'm drowning. It really just depends on how u want it to fit on you. If you want a lot of extra room order your exact size or up but if you want a tighter fit order down cause it runs big. Overall i'm super pleased with my purchase & will definitely be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: bibiana

customer_reviews.title: I was sent one that had been altered to remove the large sides
customer_reviews.text: I took others advice and ordered down a size...top fit fine, but someone had altered the large sides and removed all the fullness which makes the jumpsuit interesting...I ordered another one in a larger size before I discovered that the first one had been altered, so the larger one will probably be too big on top...hopefully the one that is coming won't at least have been butchered like the first one was...returned the first one already
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Awsome buy very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I love this outfit! It is comfy and relaxing. I got a size large and i would say get the size you would normally get in strech pants or leggings. I can wear a size large in this garment however if you want it more snug around your ankles then get a medium. Either way a size M and L will work for me as it hides my tummy and the breast area is a perfect fit and i am a 38 DDD. I recommand this item i got black and green I will be getting more colors of this as my mom would say "hammer time"
customer_reviews.author: Michgirl88

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fits nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY hesitant to buy after a few disappointing clothes purchases but I read through the reviews and ordered. Now I want another one! I'm 5'7", 240lbs hourglass shape. This looks so good! The material is better than I thought it would be and it goes to my ankles. Plenty of torso length/room and theres no pulling or uncomfortable feeling at all. It's very flattering even if you're plus size.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this feels. Super comfortable. I’m 5’4, 245 lbs. from reading the other reviews I bought a Med. it’s fits fine. Arm holes are just right. Maybe a little right across the boobs. Next time I’ll order a large. I will be ordering more. I plan on wearing a t-shirt under it when I want a little more arm coverage. Light weight fabric but not see through.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Put this in your cart!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something cute and comfortable to wear while huge and pregnant. I read all the reviews and decided to try it myself. MOST COMFORTABLE thing EVER! The material is so soft and has stretch. Excellent quality and sufficient thickness. Baggy in all the right places but not so much so that anything is hanging out in front. I was nervous about the straps and the amount of cleavage that may or may not show...not an issue. Keeps everything covered. And the best part is that the jumper is made so well that I now wear it post pregnancy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Fabric sucks, sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Other than the problem I have with the fabric (cheap spandex) This looks horrible on me lol I'm 5'6" 170lbs hourglass figure and ordered my normal L. The crotch went down to my knees, and it was SUPER baggy around my waist not a good look. I might try this style from another company because I think it would work if it was designed a little better and was made out of a cotton blend.
customer_reviews.author: Astra

customer_reviews.title: Always wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jumpsuit. I wear it ALL THE TIME. My husband gets annoyed with how much I wear it, but I had him try it on, so he knows how comfortable it is. I've also convinced three of my friends to purchase one. Essentially, everyone wears a small. Definitely size down. I'm planning on buying this jumpsuit in every (almost) color. My only wish is that it had pockets! If it had pockets I would throw my wardrobe away and only wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahnade

customer_reviews.title: NOT flattering for my shape.
customer_reviews.text: NOT flattering for my shape. Other than that, I might have liked it. Would have been super comfy. Definitely made large. Fit will depend on your style and your chest/shoulders and height. I'm a short pear, with thicker lower legs. The small was the perfect size for my height and upper body, not too tight, but fit. Bottom of legs were fitted, but not too tight. I just felt that the baggy part hung out strangely and made me look like a weird diamond shape. If I would have gotten bigger, the baggy part would have hung to my ankles and looked even more strange.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" 150# and the small fit just fine. The calves were slightly tighter than I like (I do have larger calves) but, they were still comfortable. The armholes were high so this could be worn with nothing underneath. With that said, I later ordered a medium and found it to be more comfortable. So I returned the small even though I was thrilled to be in a "small" size, even if it was just for a moment!
customer_reviews.author: Rajnish K.

customer_reviews.title: comfort, ease - will get more colors
customer_reviews.text: I use this for inside lounging, walking, beach (at some point I’ll return to the ocean!) - it’s SUPER comfortable, meant to look oversized. Cuffs at ankles really help it from slipping. So no worries about tripping over the pant leg. I love this jumpsuit. I am 5’2’ weigh 123 and Small is perfect. No pockets, but I don’t mind that at all. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Offset

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping. Don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Not even cute as a mumu around the house and I wear harem jumpsuits out of the house to work regularly. The white is too thin and so unstructured that the material gets in the way of even doing dishes and walking around the house. Really unflattering high neckline. Do your self a favor and keep shopping around!
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very thin but super cute. I bought this in the fuchsia and it's very cute! I wanted it for my cruise as a cover up that I can go island hopping with and it's perfect. I listened to the reviews on the size and reluctantly ordered a Medium when I'm a large/xl and it's perfect. I have a belly and thick rump area and it's plenty roomy then it is fitted up top without being sloppy. I would get again and plan to get it in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2.5” and 145lbs with a mom tum (I carry ALL of my weight there lol) and got a small! It fits perfect and it’s SO COMFORTABLE 😍 I will say though, the material is quite thin. It’s a good thing because it’s lightweight. Considering the amount of fabric this has, it wouldn’t be as comfortable if it wasn’t. But you def can’t wear this without a bra or nipple covers lol it’s pretty sheer. I purchased it for a specific event and will update with photos when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Essie

customer_reviews.title: Felt like a sad pink potato
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, but everything else about this jumpsuit was a disappointment. As soon as I put it on I was like .... "oh." For my body type, I think I just need some kind of defined waist if I want a jumpsuit to work for me (I'm short and busty without much butt to speak of). Immediately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and thin
customer_reviews.text: Very stretchy and comfortable but VERY thin material. If you have any lumps or bumps you’ll wanna sport some hardcore shapewear under this bad boy before going into public. I purchased this in orange for a Halloween costume and, afterward, for lounging around the house, and it will fit that purpose just fine. I am 6’ 200lbs and would normally wear an XL, but I purchased a Large due to other reviews and it fits well. If I buy a different color in the future I’ll probably go with XL for a little more room and protection against shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I went down a size like the other reviews said
customer_reviews.text: I went down a size like the other reviews said, but it's still too big on me. That's fair bc I'm not even five feet tall, so... It's super comfortable though! If it fit, it'd be the cutest thing!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Durham

customer_reviews.title: Pros- very light Cons- very light
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! Presentation is lacking/ just comes in a bag, no tags, but no big deal since it’s so affordable. Less waste. It is kinda see through, so you’ll have to wear undies that match the color or swimsuit. I dunno that I’ll wear this for every day since it’s see through. I’m 5’2” and 170- got the medium. It will work for my trip to the beach :) they look way cute with the narrow leg on your calf instead of them rolled down.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not for 5 ft tall persons
customer_reviews.text: It fit wrong in various places. I’m 5’ (150-165 lbs) and the crouch went down to below my knee (close to my ankle if you wanna be honest). Top portion a little tighter than the rest of the loose fit so it was awkward. Material is really nice. I just honestly do not recommend for shorter persons. It’s sad cause I have 2 similar rompers from somewhere else and love them. Have one on order for my thinner and taller daughter so hopefully that will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: So comfy but not strong seams
customer_reviews.text: This onesie is so comfy and soft but the seams rip with the slightest pull and since there are no zippers on other ways to get it on you have to pull open the top. It hasn't completely unraveled on me but a lot of the seams are strings now. The fabric seems pretty resilient to stretch once on, maybe they didn't make the seems stretchy. Other than that the rest of the onesie is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. I even paid for 1 day shipping because I wanted to wear this for my birthday....it literally looked like I was wearing a squirrel suit. Legs up, legs down; with belt, without belt, it was just a hot squirrel mess on me. Only place I'll be wearing this, is in my house to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: so comfy, versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit! There are other brands that cost 3x as much and are no better so save yourself some money. Can be dressed up or down, can belt it if you want to show off your shape. good for layering, really this is a great product. I've worn it to work, to dance class, to garden. If you are on the fence, hop off and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Martini

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumper! It has to be THE most comfortable piece of clothing I own. I read all of the reviews, trying to figure out what size to buy. Well, I bought medium and they fit perfectly! I’m a big girl with 45” hips, big thighs, big everything. The black one is so figure flattering. I bought green and blue also, but have only worn the black one. I’m 5’4” and 172 pounds. I usually wear an xl. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sultrydragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item! It is perfect! Can be dressed up or worn very casual. I ordered a medium & it fit perfectly. I am 5ft. 5in. & weigh 160lbs. (currently working on loosing weight & feel even when I loose the 20-30lbs, it will still be wearable). The length is perfect! Washed in machine on cold & dried in dryer on low heat... Didn’t shrink or fade. Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Order size you wear no need to go larger it a loose fit style
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I’m 5’9”, long torso 190lbs and 34dd/36c bust I ordered M perfect fit for the style it fits loose very slimming and comfortable, add belt heels and jewelry for evening or flat gladiator sandals for daytime, love it
customer_reviews.author: Livvy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love, Did I mention I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!! I read practically every review to see what other women similar to my size would look like as well as trying to figure out what size myself to order. I am glad I did. I am 5'4" 187lbs. Chest is 38D Sizes Lg. Shirts. 12/Lg pants. I ultimately went with a small and very happy that I did. I personally feel like if I would've order anything larger I would've been greatly disappointed. This runs EXTREMELY Big. But thats also the point.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas kid 1

customer_reviews.title: Shhh... Best keep this a secret...best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled beyond words when I put this jumpsuit on. I'm 320 lbs and the XL was perfect and so flattering. It swopes and hangs in all the right places. I'm a stylist full figure woman and I own my 'big sexy', so when I say I turned heads in this outfit, I did just that! I ordered 4 more and I'm going to order all the other colors. I can wear this every day. You can dress it up for a night out or just be comfy with sandals. I don't think I've ever loved a piece of clothing so much!
customer_reviews.author: Alva B

customer_reviews.title: Not quite like the pic but cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute romper. The crotch is lower than it looks in the pic though, so the bottom half is sort of MC Hammer-esque. I’m 5’4” and the crotch is just about to my knees. I wear a 12/14 and the medium fits perfectly. It’s too bad it doesn’t have pockets, but as a woman I’ve learned to live without them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer wear
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of hesitant about purchasing this outfit because I'm short ,thick and curvy. I ordered the extra large by looking at some of the reviews and females that are my size it looked OK on them so I tried it and love it. The material is light, and free flowing because I'm short but the fit I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyplus

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfy
customer_reviews.text: ...jumpsuit that can be dressed up or down and worn throughout the seasons with a jacket or bodysuit. I love jumpsuits and this one is about to go in rotation! The fabric is ridiculously soft; the fit loose but drapes well. Armholes are big so I plan to wear a cami underneath. I got the green color which is a pretty jewel tone; I'd order more colors. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ReadWriteRepeat

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear a large and ordered a medium and it fits perfect! I really love the jumpsuit though
customer_reviews.text: The jumpsuit fits larger than your regular size. I read all the reviews and most of them said to order a size or 2 smaller. I normally wear a large and ordered a medium and it fits perfect! I really love the jumpsuit though. You can dress it up with heels and a blazer or down with flats. Fits very nice if you get it a size smaller than your normal size! I've ordered 2!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacation wear!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this jumpsuit for quiet sometime and last week I saw the very same one on a women on "Ellen". To top it off it was in the same color that I had been drooling over. That did it, I ordered the very same day in medium. I'm 146 lbs/5ft/5in. and the med.fits great. So glad I have it now. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Frunch

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Time!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL. I wear a size 14 pant so I might should of ordered a Large, but it’s super comfy and fun. The legs are a true “hammer style” leg fit so if you aren’t looking for that down ruby these. However, if you pull the legs up a bit like a Capri the hammer say legs go away. I’ve worn them both ways.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material and beautiful colour. It's comfortable but i normally wear a medium and though i expected it to be baggy, this was a bit excessive. The straps were also too long. I purchased it to lounge in the house so i'm keeping it, but think a small would have fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go Small
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thankful for the other reviews. Because of them I was able to get my right sz. I’m 5’71/2, 194wt. I ordered the army green and the black both sz med. Received an army green in med and black in a sm. Guess what, both fit and I’m keeping both. FYI, kinda like the fit of the sm better. Thx to all of you who sent pics. You guys look great and it really helps those of us who are trying to decide.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chill outfit
customer_reviews.text: I love this romper! I personally use them as pajamas and lounging, but you could definitely wear it out if you wanted to. The material is soft and comfortable even after a few washed so far. The color is great, and the quality is excellent. I've already come back to buy more! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased you have to try them
customer_reviews.text: The outfit fits well very colorful and the perfect size i get so many compliments I even had to order a few for my friends they love them and they are telling other family members about them and they are ordering them so I will continue telling others about it they love the comfort of them and they're very beautiful thank you
customer_reviews.author: lynn jones

product_meta.title: Dreamskull Women's Punk Spaghetti Strap Jumpsuit V Neckline Comfy Loose Harem One Piece Romper
feature_bullets: Pull On closure;Belt is not included.
Casual harem rompers feature spaghetti strap, v neck Low back, ruched design
Loose,relaxable and comfortable Jogger style Harem pants with good stretchable
oted: Please choose your size as our SIZE CHART in the left Size PICTURES Instead of Amazon Size Chart.Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement.
